__e: "Not a job," she says of being first lady.
In 20 years in the palace, and two years as first lady, you never showed up here once.
Once again, I'm comfortable with the First Lady's decision.
He told you that you would be first lady, and you believed him!
Because anything the First Lady does that is different everyone seizes on.
What happened to your friend, the first lady, was on you.
Does it ever weird you out that you and Dad are, like... the President and the First Lady?
I couldn't help but overhear, but I always thought that lady was a little damaged.
And to do that as a woman, yet alone as sitting first lady, that's not just hard, it's all but impossible.
Well, for starters, that you stole the McPherson loan file off my desk and gave it to First National.
I thought you called me down here because I gave that loan to First National...
Regardless, it's not the kind of business we want at First National.
